evidence_assessment: evidence shows BFN custom included holding elections every two years
decision_reasoning: failure to hold the 2010 election and the extension of terms by Chief and Council was contrary to BFN custom
application_details: Chief and Council bypassed customary processes using a flawed survey, ignoring member participation and transparency requirements
result_of_case: Chief and Councillors removed from office
new election mandated within 60 days under supervision of Stoney Tribal Council
